attributes.additional_details:
The cost of reimbursing Farmers when things go wrong is becoming unsustainable for us Tax payers.

Why is farming subsidies not capped or means tested ?

Why should a farmer qualify for subsidies and still own a big farm house and Range Rover not to mention the obligatory horse !

At the very least subsides should not be a cash "do what you want payment" but rather tokens or such for buying feed etc etc...Not for keeping horses or Big second car for the wife.

A shop keeper does not get help if he cant run his business efficiently - he would just have to go bankrupt
